Instrument(s)/Platform(s): UniCel DxC 600i/660i/680i/860i/880i SYNCHRON Access Clinical Systems
Methodologies: Enzymatic measurement using PEPC and NADH analog, spectrophotometric detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SYNCHRON Systems Enzymatic CO2 (CO2E) Reagent for quantitative measurement of carbon dioxide in serum or plasma using enzymatic spectrophotometric method.
Indications for Use Summary: For the quantitative determination of Carbon Dioxide in human serum or plasma when used with UniCel DxC 800 System and SYNCHRON Systems AQUA CAL 1 and 3.
